title: Riot please create an item like thornmail but for AP?
body: AP damage reflect magic damage back to the user ?

replies.body:
Why? Thornmail is virtually useless once the AD gets lifesteal and MR.

We don't need another nerf to AP. And that's exactly what that would be as AP doesn't have reliable spellvamp any more.

Tbf, spellvamp wasn't really useful to many champs besides Vlad.

Also an AP thornmail could potentially murder Azir.

The reason it wont work is the same reason spell vamp doesnt work.  All aas are the same so lifesteal can be tweaked but balanced.  Theres too many different abilities for this to be balanced and not just shut down certain champs but not be useless against others.
no body restricted thorn mail to ads, build it if you like.
